name: iApartments
0:
”Alexa, turn on smart plug”
”Alexa, set thermostat mode to cool”
”Alexa, set the thermostat to 72 degrees”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des:
iApartments smart apartments give renters total comfort, convenience, and control of their home with no set up required! Locks, thermostat, plugs, and more, it’s already built in!

With the iApartments skills and Alexa, you can now interact with your iApartments thermostat and smart plug by voice. To get started, select the 'Enable Skill' button to link your iApartments resident account and discover your devices. 

You must reside in an iApartments community to enjoy.
